text: Three Summers () is a 2019 Brazilian drama film directed by Sandra Kogut. It was screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2019 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Regina Casé * Rogério Fróes * Otávio Müller ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 films Category:2019 drama films Category:Brazilian films Category:Brazilian drama films Category:Portuguese-language films
title: Three Summers (2019 film)
